column1: Petitioner’s discharge amounts to double jeopardy, nor can I agree with the argument
that the decision to discharge the Petitioner on the basis that her services are no longer
required to be ultra vires. Considering all the material before this Court, the uncontested
contention  of  want  of  maintaining  strict  discipline,  this  Court  cannot  agree  with  the
Petitioner’s contention that the impugned decision in prayer “b” is unreasonable.
